sense.def:
The night
je tisti del dneva, ko je zunaj temno, zlasti čas, ko večina ljudi spi.

seg.quote: We walked for six days and six nights.
He woke in the night with a dreadful pain.

sense.def:
Night
je tudi doba med koncem popoldneva in časom, ko gremo spat.

Kadar se nekaj dogaja
day and night
ali
night and day
, se dogaja ves čas brez odmora.

seg.quote: They were being guarded night and day.

sense.def:
To have an early night
pomeni iti zgodaj spat.
To have a late night
pomeni iti pozno spat.
